findings.title: AI Tool/Agent Innovation
findings.author: @Web3Aible
findings.whatItIs: New AI-powered tool or agent capability
findings.howItWorks: Uses LLMs or AI agents to automate or enhance workflows
findings.opinion: AI tools are hot but crowded. Differentiation is key.
findings.opportunity: Niche down, integrate with existing workflows, or build wrappers
findings.difficulty: Low-Medium - many AI tools are wrappers around APIs

findings.title: Problem/Pain Point Identified
findings.author: @Web3Aible
findings.whatItIs: Someone expressing frustration or unmet need
findings.howItWorks: Organic signal of a real market problem without a good solution
findings.opinion: Direct problem statements are gold. This is pre-validated demand.
findings.opportunity: Build the exact solution they need
findings.difficulty: Medium - requires building the actual product

findings.title: SpoogemanGhost
findings.author: @theonejvo
findings.whatItIs: A new product or feature has been launched
findings.howItWorks: Recently released to the public, likely gaining initial traction
findings.opinion: Early launches often indicate market gaps. First-mover advantage possible.
findings.opportunity: Build complementary tools, integrations, or alternatives
findings.difficulty: Medium - requires understanding the product and market
